casebody.data:
CHILDREN'S HOSPITAL LOS ANGELES, et al., petitioners,
v.
N.L., a Minor, By and Through his Guardian ad Litem, Jacqueline ARCE. No. 17-1633. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 1, 2018.

Motion of California Hospital Association, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
